AUTHOR: Kowlin and Aioxas
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing this. 
You can start your search by doing [p]advgoogle
NAME: Advanced Google
DESCRIPTION:
Retrieves the first result of a Google search, or one of the results of a Google Image search.
Originally made by Kowlin from https://github.com/Kowlin/refactored-cogs . 
I took the liberty of editing some of his code to make it
